sentences.en: A climate of fear would arrest a healthy maturation of diplomatic personnel.
sentences.cn: 胆战心惊的心理会妨碍外交人员的健康成长.

sentences.en: Another candle adds another maturation to the charm of your life.
sentences.cn: 蜡烛每增添一支,你的生命风韵便成熟了一分.

sentences.en: During the period of maturation, which results in premature farrowings.
sentences.cn: 在胚胎发育成熟期间, 通常会有早产.

sentences.en: Fermentation, the process where grape juice turns into wine and Maturation.
sentences.cn: 发酵期是葡萄汁发酵成酒的过程而成熟期.

sentences.en: In maturation stage, it was decreased rapidly and lower than seedling.
sentences.cn: 成熟期微生物量碳含量迅速下降,都低于播种前.

sentences.en: Many enterprises compete acutely in liqueur trade because of its maturation.
sentences.cn: 白酒行业作为成熟行业,竞争日趋加剧.

sentences.en: Maturation plays a large role in emotional development.
sentences.cn: 在情感发展中成熟扮演极重要角色.

sentences.en: Only the secondary oocyte is destined for further maturation.
sentences.cn: 只有次级卵母细胞会预期进一步成熟.

sentences.en: Similar interconversions occur during the process of seed development and maturation.
sentences.cn: 在种子发育和成熟过程中出现同样的相互转变作用.

sentences.en: Territory by long - term soil tillage cultivation, a higher degree of maturation.
sentences.cn: 境内土壤经 长期 耕垦, 熟化程度较高.

sentences.en: The maturation of cinders for recovering iron and its mechanism were studied.
sentences.cn: 研究了熟化法回收硫铁矿浇渣中的铁及其反应机理.

sentences.en: The period of maturation is determined by the cellar master.
sentences.cn: 酿熟期的长短由地窖的主人决定。

sentences.en: The squamous cells show maturation from basal layer to surface.
sentences.cn: 鳞状上皮从基底层到表层逐步成熟.

sentences.en: This extensive antibody maturation presents a challenge for vaccine design.
sentences.cn: 这种广泛的抗体成熟形式为疫苗设计提出了挑战.

sentences.en: This is the digital mobile communication system development and maturation period.
sentences.cn: 这是数字移动通信系统发展和成熟时期.

words.tran_cn: 成熟的；充分考虑的；到期的；成年人的
使…成熟；使…长成；慎重作出
[生物]成熟；化脓；生殖细胞之形成

trans.tran_en: the period during which something grows and develops
